title: Dolly Alderton • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #95
itunes:title: Dolly Alderton • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #95
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the brilliant podcaster, journalist and author (non-fictioner) and all round sincere talent DOLLY ALDERTON!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the brilliant podcaster, journalist and author (non-fictioner) and all round sincere talent DOLLY ALDERTON!


Ultra fun times to be had this week folks, as Brett teams up with Dolly via the medium of a very well known social communication app that rhymes with “BOOM”, “DOOM” or if you like “ZOOM” (…wait, hold up…), and has a super great chat which delves deep into all aspects of Dolly’s life and loves via the medium of cinema! Ohhh it’s a goodie. This may be the episode from which ‘non-fictioner’ becomes a thing too. You watch this space and mark my words. A solid introduction which gets into all things writing and the process behind it all, having ‘natter happy friends’ (zooming and facetiming all over the place), good writing talk, EPN (you’ll find out what that cheery acronym means), being intimidated by film geeks (uh oh…) and a whole ton more - some real gems right here for you, everyone. So please, take yourself some time from the day and enjoy this lovely chat with Brett and Dolly!


LINKS FOR THIS EPISODE:

DOLLY on TWITTER!

DOLLY on THE INTERNET!

EVERYTHING I KNOW ABOUT LOVE!

GHOSTS!


BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM!

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on PATREON!

SUPERBOB - Brett's 2015 feature film!

CORNERBOYS with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!

DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM
